Portal.display_help: Nicti energy entities will continue to spawn from this Shadow Crystal until it is destroyed.

Resistance.display_help: Inherent resistance of all inanimate objects. Inanimate objects cannot be moved, knocked back, Healed with normal Heal powers, Disoriented, Held, Slept, Confused, Feared, Taunted or debuffed. They are always Immobilized. Since they have no mind, they inherently take less damage from Psionics.
Resistance.display_target_help: Inherent resistance of all inanimate objects. Inanimate objects cannot be moved, knocked back, Healed with normal Heal powers, Disoriented, Held, Slept, Confused, Feared, Taunted or debuffed. They are always Immobilized. Since they have no mind, they inherently take less damage from Psionics.

Safe_Zone.display_help: Nictus Entities are safe, as long as they remain in this zone.

Expel.display_help: The Demons quickly leave the portal as they teleport through it.
